help.title: Help Menu
help.text: Click the title of the course to return to the beginning of the course.
This is the navigation, and your main means of getting around the course. The main categories are at the top, and the sub-categories listed below. Each section gets checked off as you visit it.
This is the progress bar. It gradually increases as you go through the course, helping you to keep track of your overall progress.

assessment.title: Assessment
assessment.text:
Are you sure you want to exit this learning module?

We encourage you to explore this module thoroughly, revisiting those areas that may require a deeper understanding for you. The more you know, the more results you'll see on the sales floor! You can choose to exit to the assessment at any time.

page.title: Part to Look For
page.name: s1p1
page.laserbeam: The Part To Look For Is The Part You Can't See
page.body: In this training, we’re going to talk about the Qualcomm Snapdragon line-up, and give you information about customers and their needs so you can help them make a smart decision. Let's get started.

page.title: Snapdragon Line Up
page.name: s2p1
page.body: Each level of Snapdragon processor is design to give mobile users a perfect balance of power and efficiency.
page.text: Tap and drag the table to see more content
Selling Tip: Understand your customer’s needs so you can determine the Snapdragon processor that’s right for them.

page.title: Snapdragon 800
page.name: s3p1
page.body: Snapdragon 800 is the rock star in the Snapdragon line-up. It's designed for high-end smartphones, tablets, Smart TVs and digital media players. It’s ideal for the “cutting edge” customer. Talk about:
page.text: Features
Specs
4K Ultra HD video playback and 7.1 surround sound
Powerful graphic performance for responsive gaming
Powerful connectivity with 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 802.11ac, Bluetooth 4.0
View Product Brief

page.title: Snapdragon 800: Customer
page.name: s3p2
page.laserbeam: Snapdragon 800 Customer: Lives on the Edge
page.body:
• Loves gaming, entertainment and HD video chat
  • Into high-end devices and know a lot about tech
  • Use device for 6+ hours a day
page.text: Selling Tip: This customer has high expectations. Be ready to dive in deep on features and technologies.

page.title: Snapdragon 600
page.name: s4p1
page.body: Snapdragon 600 is designed for customers who use their devices for a lot of entertainment like movies and gaming. With this customer you might talk about:
page.text: Features
Specs
Responsive web browsing, scrolling and zooming
Smooth video capture, playback and upload
Reliable connections with 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 802.11ac, Bluetooth 4.0
View Product Brief

page.title: Snapdragon 600: Customer
page.name: s4p2
page.laserbeam: Snapdragon 600 Customer: Appreciates All Around Performance
page.body:
• Heavy web browsing, social networking
  • Camera, video and connectivity for fast uploads are important
  • Use device for 4+ hours a day
page.text: Selling Tip: This customer needs all-around performance, but might be interested in a Snapdragon 800 device if they are a movie enthusiast.

page.title: Snapdragon 400
page.name: s5p1
page.body: Snapdragon 400 is designed for people who are constantly connected through social media and online communication. With this customer you talk about:
page.text: Features
Specs
Responsive web browsing, scrolling and zooming
Reliable connections with 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 802.11ac, Bluetooth 4.0
Great voice and data connectivity
View Product Brief

page.title: Snapdragon 400: Customer
page.name: s5p2
page.body:
• Light web browsing, email and social networking
  • May listen to music or watch online video
  • Use device for 4+ hours a day
page.text: This is the mainstream customer. Show them social media, email and entertainment capabilities.

page.title: Snapdragon 200
page.name: s6p1
page.body: Snapdragon 200 is designed for people that want a quality smartphone at a great price. With this customer talk about:
page.text: Features
Specs
Auto Volume Mode makes voice calling easier
Apps for music playback and GPS are usually pre-installed
Great graphics performance for web browsing and social media
View Product Brief

page.title: Snapdragon 200: Customer
page.name: s6p2
page.body:
• Uses the basics like voice and texting
  • Uses basic apps like music, maps and email
  • Use device for about 1 hour a day
page.text: Selling Tip: This customer wants a quality smartphone at a value price. Don’t get technical. Show them the basics and emphasize simplicity of use.

page.title: Drag and Drop Excercise
page.name: s7p1
page.body:
You've learned about the Snapdragon processor, and you've learned about some of the customers you might encounter in your store. Let's put it all together.

Drag and drop the right processor to the right customer to make the right recommendation.
page.text:
You've learned about the Snapdragon processor, and you've learned about some of the customers you might encounter in your store. Let's put it all together.

Click the right processor to the right customer to make the right recommendation.
Snapdragon 200
Just the basics - this might be their first smartphone!
Great work. Remember that this customer might have modest needs right now, but treat them right and they'll be ready to move up in the future.
Snapdragon 400
Wants to stay connected with social media and online communication
You got it. Don't forget to show them Snapdragon 600 or even 800 devices as well! This customer might not know what appeals to them until you show them.
Snapdragon 600
Looking for all-around performance for social sharing and entertainment
Right - and this customer might be very interested in Snapdragon 800 devices. Tell them, "If you like that, you'll LOVE this."
Snapdragon 800
Looking for the best, most advanced mobile experience possible

That's right. This customer might really know their stuff - and might just need you to point them in the right direction and then get out of the way. Be prepared to talk tech; this is a great opportunity for demonstrate your expertise and build a relationship with your customer.

page.title: Summary
page.name: s8p1
page.body: You’ve completed the training on Qualcomm Snapdragon processors. Listen to your customer so you can help them decide which device will best suit their needs. Remember: You can’t go wrong when you choose a device with Snapdragon.
